title: Enrichment of extracellular vesicles from serum or plasma via ultracentrifugation
procedures:
1. For each replicate, start with 1 ml serum or plasma.
  2. Bring up volume to fill ultracentrifuge tube with PBS.
  3. Centrifuge for 90 min at 100,000 x g at 4°C.
  4. Discard supernatant and resuspend pellet in PBS to fill ultracentrifuge tube.
  5. Centrifuge for 70 min at 100,000 x g at 4°C.
  6. Discard supernatant.
  7. Proceed to miRNeasy RNA isolation by adding 1 mL Qiazol to pellet.
